tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TravelItinerary (
  itinerary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  destination VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  travel_dates DATE,
  interests TEXT,
  special_requests TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50),
  customer_email VARCHAR(100),
  customer_phone VARCHAR(20),
  customer_address VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE destinations (
  destination_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  destination_name VARCHAR(50),
  destination_description TEXT,
  destination_image_url VARCHAR(255),
  destination_rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE preferences (
  preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  destination_id INT,
  travel_date DATE,
  special_requests TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE itineraries (
  itinerary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  destination_id INT,
  itinerary_details TEXT,
  itinerary_cost DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE Travelers (
    traveler_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Destinations (
    destination_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination_name VARCHAR(100),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    traveler_id INT REFERENCES Travelers(traveler_id),
    destination_id INT REFERENCES Destinations(destination_id),
    travel_style VARCHAR(50),
    budget DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(100),
    destination_id INT REFERENCES Destinations(destination_id),
    duration_hours INT,
    cost DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Itineraries (
    itinerary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    traveler_id INT REFERENCES Travelers(traveler_id),
    destination_id INT REFERENCES Destinations(destination_id),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);
